about: I am a passionate developer with expertise in building modern web applications. With a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies, I create scalable and user-friendly solutions that solve real-world problems.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution built with React and Node.js, featuring real-time inventory management and secure payment processing.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, built using Vue.js and Firebase.

projects.title: Portfolio Generator
projects.description: An automated portfolio generator that creates beautiful, responsive websites from JSON data.
